Cross finance client questionnaire

Not verified

1. The purpose of registration (please indicate all possible reasons):

Electronic money issuing is a regulated activity in the United Kingdom. We are FCA
(Financial Conduct Authority) licensed and have an EMI (Electronic Money Institution) status.
This status authorises us to issue electronic money.

The legislation provides for general rules to regulate and monitor e-money institutions
in order to ensure security and stability of these institutions. Under these rules we request
certain information related to a client's financial activity.

By filling in this questionnaire you confirm that the provided information is
true and relevant. You must notify us within 30 days about any changes in the information
submitted.
